commit_description:
Updating ArduinoJson API to newest version

createObject is deprecated

Use serializeJson instead of printTo

RawJson is deprecated in arduinojson v6

Newest version does not use rvalues

Small edit

Use str instead of buffer

Replace deprecated get notation ArduinoJson

Use json long long support for proper uint32 handling

commit_description:
Turned out that the real problem was not with the Disconnection event,
but rather with connectToBestAP not checking if STATION_IDLE before
ordering up a new scan.

Change the station flow so that it only scans intermittently and only
when there is not something already connected and only after a delay.
Now constant scanning does not screw up display function

tcpConnect was failing asynchronously because the espconn and esp_tcp
were going out of scope.  Added _stationConn and _stationTcp to the
easyMesh class.

commit_title: Added no STA connect if already AP connected
commit_description:
Added some functionality so that the node will not attempt to make a
station connection to any AP which is already connected to it.
